Lines.Speaker:
Jane to Gertrude and her Children 1 
- Gertrude sentiment -1, Children sentiment 1 (do they each get a vote?)

Lines.Text: As you approach Gertrude looks desperate and busy.

Lines.Speaker: Jane to Gertrude and her Children 1 - Gertrude sentiment -1, Children sentiment 1 (do they each get a vote?)
Jane Foole
Lines.Text: Hi Gertrude, how's it going

Lines.Speaker: Gertrude
Lines.Text: Not good! I don't have time to chat.

Lines.Speaker: Gertrude
Lines.Text:
I wanted to make my famous stew for us tonight, but the ingredients have gone missing!
My children love it so much, I don't know what I will do.

Lines.Speaker: Jane Foole
Lines.Text: If I help you find the ingredients, will you come to the party and vote for me tonight?

Lines.Speaker: Gertrude
Lines.Text: Yes, of course, please go and look for them!

Lines.Speaker: Gertrude
Lines.Text: I don't have time right now! Please find the ingredients soon

Lines.Speaker: Jane Foole
Lines.Text: Hi Gertrude, look what I've got!
*gives Gertrude the ingredients*

Lines.Speaker: Gertrude
Lines.Text:
Oh my! Thank you so much! We will see you later!
And don't worry, I'll vote for you, no matter how funny Sneako is.

Lines.Speaker: Jane Foole
Lines.Text: You're welcome, thank you.
The children look concerned, but you're not sure what for.

Lines.Speaker: Children
Lines.Text: We have NO idea where the ingredients could be!

Lines.Speaker: Children
Lines.Text: We're so worried, pleaseeeeee find them soon

Lines.Speaker: Children
Lines.Text:
Thank you so much for helping!
We are sooooo pleased we can eat the stew again, 4 times this week. Woo. hoo.

Lines.Speaker: Jane to Children 3 (if you re enter the building)
Children
Lines.Text: You fool! We hid the ingredients, we didn't want stew 4 times in a row! Or any more times!

Lines.Speaker: Jane Foole
Lines.Text: First of all, thank you. Secondly, how was I meant to know? You seemed excited to eat it.

Lines.Speaker: Children
Lines.Text: You are such a fopdoodle!

Lines.Speaker: Jane Foole
Lines.Text: Let me fop-a-doodle- DO a juggling routine to win you back over

Lines.Speaker: *Jane does her terrible air juggling routine*
Children
Lines.Text: HAHAHAHAHA

Lines.Speaker: Children
Lines.Text: Wow, that was SO bad, HAHAHAHAHA

Lines.Speaker: Children
Lines.Text: Embarrass yourself like that again tonight and we will definitely vote for you.

Lines.Speaker: Jane Foole
Lines.Text: Glad it was as funny as when I did it for Cecily
